decision_conditions: The internal change from two units into one unit shall be implemented as per the details on the approved plans. These works shall be completed to the Council's satisfaction within six months of the date of this permission, otherwise planning permission will lapse. If
the internal changes are undertaken within 6 months, then other development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to remedy the existing situation and to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): 011-2021-PA-MHOS (Location Plan, Block Plan); 011-2021-PA-MH-001 (Ground Floor and Roof Plan as Existing); 011-2021-PA-MH-002 (Existing Elevations); 011-2021-PA-MH-003 (Approved Floor Plans); 011-2021-PA-MH-004 (Approved Elevations); 011-2021-PA-MH-005 (Proposed Floor Plans); 011-2021-PA-MH-006 (Proposed Elevations)

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | Notwithstanding the details shown on the plans, all external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | No part of the roof of the single storey projections shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4, and 7.B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013); adopted Development (or Core) Strategy (April 2012); policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and National Planning Policy Framework (2019). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 an 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013).
description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable ends; rear roof extension; Installation of five roof lights to front roof slope; single storey rear infill extension; associated internal and external alterations involving conversion of two self-contained residential units into single dwelling
